title: Kerala influencer suicide: Teen's friend held under Pocso
selftext:
Okay, so activity avoid highschool romances because you can be called a rapist if something goes down? Can the POCSO be challenged in this case ? 

How is this abetment of suicide by the guy? 

I've so many questions man, I'd love to discuss this.
comments:
Like almost any charge, yes it can be challenged and most times in such situations the courts are lenient and only force counselling or something. 

Also, not exactly but this is why we need a 'Romeo and Juliet' clause in the Act. Any couple under 18 engaging in any sexual activity automatically commits a crime against each other under POCSO.

So did they charge the dude with POCSO just to arrest and keep him in custody? 

Like, for questioning and stuff?

It's a cognizable, non-bailable offence. 

If the Police come to know of it, they sort of have to arrest and charge the person. Someone else need not file a case or anything.
